<redux-counter>

This example shows how to create web components connected to the redux store instance using the hybrids library. 

      <redux-counter></redux-counter>
      <redux-counter offset="2"></redux-counter>
      <redux-counter offset="10"></redux-counter>

Click buttons to increase or dicrease count value of the redux store instance and see how all elements are updated. Change codebase of the <redux-counter> element and see unchanged store state after reload (HMR).

Open developer tools and use redux-devtools-extension to see current state and log of dispatched actions.
